<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Receiver Payment Consent Redirect Callback URL"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"event"}
  path={"webhook"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

:::caution deprecated

This endpoint has been deprecated and may be replaced or removed in future versions of the API.

:::

We send a webhook for every request made to the Receiver's Payment Consent Redirect Callback URL endpoints. 
When the request status is ERROR, there will be an errorCode and an errorDescription, which can be:
    

| Error Code | Error Description |
|----------|:-------------|
|PBE1800|Redirect Url Not Found|
|PBE1801|Invalid Redirect Url|
|PBE1802|Callback Redirect URL not registered|
|PBE1803|Callback Redirect URL already registered|
|PBE1804|Callback Redirect URL is not CONFIRMED|

You can sign this webhook in the logged area of this portal or via [API](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook), with the entity ```Payment Consent Redirect Callback URL (PIX)```. You can also configure the security validation method for the requests, which can be either ```mTLS Certificate``` or ```Hash Signature (HMAC SHA256 Hash)```.

For more information on the security validation methods, check the ```AUTHORIZATIONS``` section below.

For more information on webhooks, see the [Webhook Documentation](https://developer.btgpactual.com/doccm#tag/Webhook).

  as={"h2"}
